name: Sulfate-Free Green Tea Amino Acid Cleansing Foam
about: What it is:¬†A hydrating cleansing foam with green tea and a moisturizing amino acid complex that whisks away dirt and visible impurities without overly stripping skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Lightweight Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:- Green Tea Water: Provides rich hydration and is packed with antioxidants and amino acids..- Amino Acid Complex: Moisturizes, delivering a gentle, non-stripping cleanse...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free, vegan, gluten-free and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This green tea- and amino acid-infused cleansing foam has a luxuriously creamy formula. It produces a rich lather that delivers a gentle yet thorough cleanse, leaving skin feeling soft and refreshed day and night...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Green Tea Water: Provides rich hydration and is packed with antioxidants and amino acids..-Amino Acid Complex: Moisturizes, delivering a gentle, non-stripping cleanse...Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Glycol Distearate, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Propanediol, Polyquaternium-22, Fragrance/Parfum, Lauryl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Pinus Densiflora Leaf Extract, Sodium Metaphosphate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Glutamic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Acorus Calamus Root Extract...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Squeeze a pea-size amount onto palms..-Work cleanser into a rich lather. .-Gently massage onto a wet face, then rinse with lukewarm water. .-Use AM and PM...Recycling Instructions:.-Visit terracycle.com/en-us/brigades/innisfree to sign up for free..-Log into your TerraCycle¬Æ account at terracycle.com to download and print a free.shipping label..-Gather all your clean, empty innisfree products, place them in a box to ship, then drop off at your local shipping provider.

reviews.review_title: Too drying/squeaky w/o feeling clean even for oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unsponsored / bought with my own money full price! DO NOT BUY. Even with my extremely oily, sensitive skin, it left a squeaky clean feel while not feeling cleansed at all. It was extremely drying, and constantly felt like I hadn't washed it all away. I never usually leave reviews, even if they're bad, but I felt deceived since I bought this based on the thousands of 4+ star reviews on Google (clearly sponsored/incentivized to inflate the overall review score) Only + side, which is also a - aspect too - it foams a little too much (it feels like you didn't wash all of it off) & smell (fragrance is very very strong - be prepared to break out in redness & react if you have any sensitivity). It burns badly if you get it too close to your eyes. It is the most drying cleanser I've used - on par to Clean & Clear, or Neutrogena that haunts my preteen years. Even with the new formula/packaging, they still say hydrating, which is so deceptive. Yes Green Tea is a hydrating ingridient, but the way its formulated as a foam is so stripping. Right after washing my face, it's like the waterdrops are begging to be absorbed into my skin bc it's so dry but it's like repelled off. Truly a squeaky, almost plastic/rubbery feel while also feeling there's still gunk on my face. Since I bought full size, I'm just using it on my chest & back since it foams so much, but it leaves those areas feeling dry too. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND even for very oily, acne-prone people like me.

Over a longer period of time, my skin has also become softer to the touch! This is not a claim the product makes but it happened for me.  The product tells us that we only need a pea size and it is NOT lying. I squeezed out about a quarter size of product on my first use, thinking they were just exaggerating and a quarter size was TOO MUCH. A pea size is literally all you need!!! It lathers and foams like nobody‚Äôs business!!!! Even with all this lather, it didn‚Äôt strip my skin at all. It is also super soft and almost silky to the touch! The smell is very pleasant, I know some people don‚Äôt like fragrance in their skincare, but I wouldn‚Äôt consider this fragrance, honestly. It literally just smells like soapy green tea, which is basically what is in the product! The scent disappears immediately once you wash your face, so even if you don‚Äôt like the scent, you don‚Äôt have to endure it !  If the product was trash I would definitely be real and say it but I truly do believe that the claims this cleansing foam makes are genuinely true! I am not only saying that because I received this product for free in exchange for a review. I have already gone out and bought a backup!!!!!! This is my new favorite cleanser and I am so glad I got the opportunity to try it for free because I would have never tried it otherwise. reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from TopBox Marketing for reviewing purposes. Thank you @Innis and @Topboxcircle.  The product had a foil seal at the tip and is easy to open. I used it like a cream moisturizer and spread it all over. I then used a wet reusable cotton cleaning pad to wash my face and it immediately lathered into a foamy cleanser. I then rinsed by splashing my face with lukewarm water.  I used again in the morning and again at night. This time I made sure I had mascara on to see how well it removed it without making my eyes hurt. It removed everything with ease. As with any cleanser, if you get a little in the eye, it will sting a bit but it doesn‚Äôt make my eyes red or irritated.  Ingredients are natural and contain naturally derived Green Tea root and amino acids.   My skin type is normal to combination. Occasionally dry in the winter months. I rarely ever break out but if I do, it is in the T zone!  This is a cleanser that removes makeup, sunscreen and oils without clogging pores.  Love how my skin feels after using it.   Overall, this Cleansing Foam made my skin feel super clean, smooth and hydrated. It doesn‚Äôt leave my skin tight and provides a gentle non stripping cleanse that leaves you feeling fresh! I am so impressed and I highly recommend. I will definitely buy this when I run out!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for the past couple of weeks and despite the strong fragrance, I have experienced no irritation.  It is VERY concentrated, only a little dab can bring up a big lather.  The first time I used it, I had way more than I needed and it took for ever to rinse off.  Since then I just use a pin sized amount and it gets the job done. It's a thick lather - but it seems to balance out my combination skin no problem. For the price, it will last a long time since you can use so little per wash.
